name: Sliders (itch) (Aplite)
description:
This game was created for Ludum Dare 42. The theme of the competition was "Running out of space".

Move the spheres to the red tile, but watch out! 
The spheres will destroy the floor and limit the spaces avaliable.

Controls

WASD/Arrow keys - Move the sphere and helper blocks

R - Reset the level

X - Skip Level

Esc - Pause Menu
